Package com.secarta.httpsec

Interface Summary
CertificatePublisher Used by Peer to find the url of the certificate associated with a local id.
PrivateKeyService Abstracts private key operations.
 

Class Summary
Client Client side httpsec operations.
HttpsecHeader Represents an httpsec/1.0 header.
HttpsecPrincipal Represents an authenticated "principal" - an id with a fingerprint of the associated public key.
Peer Base class for Client and Server.
Primitives HTTPsec/1.0 primitives.
Server Server-side httpsec operations.
Session Httpsec session state.
SessionTable Stores sessions.
TestConfig  
Utils  
 

Enum Summary
HttpsecHeader.Type The different types of httpsec header.
 

Exception Summary
HttpsecException
